quote_first: Andrea Mitchell appears on a split screen. “Chet, we understand from a source at Homeland Security that the explosion happened at
quote_last: I don’t know how the authorities can pinpoint the time that exactly, but apparently they can.”
title: If it Bleeds
author: Stephen King

quote_last: : Duane Hinton walks out. He walks through the backyard. He lugs some clothes. He wore said clothes last night. He walks to the fence. He feeds the incinerator. He lights a match.
title: The Cold Six Thousand
author: James Ellroy
